utterances.utterance: What time did this happen, at 2:00 in the morning?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Who goes out at 2:00 or 3:00 in the morning for eggs?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Or for anything.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Well, because he said he needed it for his workout but then he couldn't get the eggs at the Walgreens --

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Who needs eggs for his workout?

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: -- and so he went to Subway for a sandwich.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: OK, and so, he went to Subway and ate bread instead because bread is better for his diet?

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: It's how he figured it out, the carb counting.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Well, I mean --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Judge, who hires two people to be your personal trainer? You only need one person.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: That's true.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: You don't hire brothers to train you. You hire one guy.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: But he liked -- maybe he liked the one guy in the bathhouse.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Maybe he wanted them to make a sandwich.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Well, the other thing is --

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Oh.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: The other thing that they tried to --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Egg sandwich?

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: -- saw doubt in is that they said that the Osundairo brothers were wanting a security contract to be able to protect Jussie Smollett when he was back and forth on the Empire set.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes, can you believe that?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Because you beat up the guy that you want to hire you to provide security. That happens all the time.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: And he has no injuries from getting beat up by these two guys.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: And by the way, the people who attacked him were pale-skinned.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Pale skinned.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: But he changed it from white --

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: They don't have pale skin from Nigeria.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: The palest from Nigeria you'll ever see.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: He said they were white and then he changed it to pale --

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Pale skin.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: -- because he felt that it was insensitive?

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes, insensitive.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Yes, yes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: They're from Nigeria.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: And he was about to pin a racial crime on every white Trump supporter in the country but he doesn't want to be insensitive.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: You know what, if I were the judge -- I'm sitting here on this show, but if I were the judge, I'd be furious. I'd say, how dare you keep us waiting.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Are we at 30 minutes right now? I think we're at 30 minutes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Definitely. Definitely at 30 minutes.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: I would add another year to the sentence.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: No, you're not --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Just on tardiness.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: The judges are smart enough to isolate that.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: But it factors in. You have to admit it factors in.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: No, it wouldn't factor, and I'm furious.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: But this was --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: You're a better judge than me.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Go ahead, Jessica.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: You are a judge.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: But this was the judge also who was accused of giving bad face by the defense team, right?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: And one of the defense attorneys -- like an objection literally to the judge's face mean looks from the defense attorney who then cried.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Oh, please.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: I mean, it has been a bit of a showboating courtroom.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Oh, now we're going to blame the judge? Don't even go there.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: I'm not. No, no, no. I'm saying --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Did anyone ever try to blame you, Judge?

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: To your point about being --

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: They didn't after a while.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: -- that they have a right to be angry.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: That this has been going on for a couple of weeks.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: He's aggravated.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Disrespect.

utterances.speaker: TARLOV
utterances.utterance: Disrespect of the --

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: You know who's been vindicated in all of this?

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Who?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: The Nigerian Princes. You know, always made fun of them about their e-mails, sending the e-mails.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: What was the line? It's just the first American to scam the Nigerians?

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Scam the Nigerians.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes. Yes. Now, I realize, you know what, we should listen more to the Nigerians, right? We had an American try to scam the Nigerians. You know, the turnabout is fair play.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: OK, we have one minute left. We're not going to get this verdict for THE FIVE which is a darn shame. A real darn shame.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: I am amazed. I am amazed.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: But you're going to get it soon because that clock is ticking. This verdict is going to be in any minute now.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: You know, it's interesting. We've got all this focus, which I love, on criminal justice whether it's Rittenhouse or, you know, Smollett, or --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Elizabeth Holmes.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes, Elizabeth Holmes, right now?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: I didn't have to go to law school.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: What about Ghislaine Maxwell?

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: I just have to cover it.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Oh, Ghislaine Maxwell.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: That. How did we -- we haven't even talked about it.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: There's not -- there's not much to talk about there because there's nothing that's come out of there that we don't already know.

utterances.speaker: PIRRO
utterances.utterance: Oh, those sick pictures. Did you see the pictures yesterday?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: What--
